comment.text: Required for ribosomal protein S1 to bind to the 30S subunit.
Part of the 30S ribosomal subunit, contacts S1 (PubMed:12068815). Some nascent polypeptide chains are able to cross-link to this protein in situ (PubMed:9716382).
Belongs to the universal ribosomal protein uS2 family.
